safaris.name: 6 Day Northern Circuit
safaris.location: Samburu, Ol Pejeta, Aberdare National Park, Kenya
safaris.details: Explore Kenyaâ€™s Northern Circuit in this 6-day adventure. Journey through Samburu, Ol Pejeta, and Aberdare National Parks, experiencing unique wildlife, cultural encounters, and scenic landscapes.

safaris.name: Maasai Mara Luxury 3 Days
safaris.details: A luxury safari to Maasai Mara, home to the Big Five and the Great Migration. Enjoy exclusive lodges, guided game drives, and breathtaking landscapes.

safaris.name: Amboseli Adventure
safaris.details: Explore Amboseli National Park, famous for its large elephant herds and stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

safaris.name: Family Balloon Expedition
safaris.details: A unique hot air balloon experience over the Maasai Mara, perfect for families looking for an unforgettable safari adventure.

safaris.name: Loisaba Lodo Springs
safaris.details: A luxurious safari retreat at Loisaba Lodo Springs, where guests can experience wildlife, scenic landscapes, and exclusive service in a private conservancy.

safaris.name: Masai Mara Wonders
safaris.details: Experience the wonders of Masai Mara, home to the Great Migration and an abundance of wildlife. Perfect for adventure seekers and photographers.

safaris.name: Lake Nakuru Safari Adventure
safaris.details: Explore Lake Nakuru National Park, famous for its flamingos, rhinos, and breathtaking landscapes.
